title: Internet-Based Integrated Language Proficiency Development Program for Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational knowledge in professional fields
context.additional_context: A customized online learning environment for improving language communication skills in the medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can perform situation-based dialogue scenarios using profession-specific terminology with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete language projects incorporating peer evaluations and feedback using online collaboration tools.
Through self-directed learning modules developed according to a Delphi technique-based design framework, learners can acquire at least five practical language skills per month.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
